page.title: 03 THE MALTINGS (continued)
page.content: Many years of hard work and fund raising by dedicated volunteers followed.By 1975 enough money had been raised to complete the first stage of conversion. Since then the Maltings reputation has grown and over 20 000 people visit the Maltings every year.They come to the Wine Festivals,Antique Fairs,Bridge Congress,Model Railway Exhibitions,Folk and Music Festivals and Toy Fairs.On the first Saturday of the month a market is held,with over 140 stalls filling the buildings and overflowing into the courtyard. Many societies and clubs meet here . The Roller Hockey Club have produced National Champions. There are frequent concerts catering for all tastes. Art exhibitions are held throughout the year in the Johnson Wax Kiln Gallery.
